title: Topic 003 Question 008
body: You have a Microsoft Teams Phone deployment.
You need to implement PSTN connectivity by using Direct Routing.
What are three requirements for the implementation? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: a Session Border Controller (SBC) that uses a hostname in the onmicrosoft.com domain
a firewall rule that opens a TCP signaling port to Microsoft Teams
a public DNS entry that maps the FQDN of the Session Border Controller (SBC) to a public IP address
a firewall rule that opens a UDP signaling port to Microsoft Teams
